backend/main.mo: Actor defining weather data types and mock query endpoints for current, daily, and weekly forecasts with simple cached structures.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module transforming old actor state to new format by adding a rainViewer metadata cache.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining light/dark CSS variables and applying theme tokens across the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point with root container and main script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing location, weather fetching, alerting, theme selection, and backend publishing of widget data.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundIllust: Displays transitioning weather‑themed background images with light/dark gradient overlays.
frontend/src/components/BeachMarineScree: Marine conditions panel showing sea temperature, waves, wind, and visibility with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Responsive bottom navigation bar with five tabs and active-state styling using icons and i18n labels.
frontend/src/components/DriverWeatherPan: Displays driver-focused weather advisories, route analysis, and risk cards with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/FarmerGardenWeat: Shows agriculture-related weather advisories like frost, soil moisture, precipitation, and planting with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/FloatingAutocomp: A floating dropdown positioned relative to an anchor element with dynamic height, scroll handling, and outside-click dismissal.
frontend/src/components/ImminentWeatherA: Banner component showing imminent weather alerts with severity-based styling, icons, and a dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/InitialRenderErr: Error boundary that catches initial render failures and displays a fallback UI with reload option and technical details.
frontend/src/components/LanguageDropdown: Floating language selector overlay positioned relative to a trigger button with outside-click and escape handling.
frontend/src/components/LaundryDryingRec: Displays best and alternative laundry drying times based on weather data, with i18n text and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/LocationSearch.t: Provides a searchable location selector with autocomplete, current selection display, and clear functionality.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarAlert: Displays an alert banner with translated severity messages and a dismiss button.
Provides UI for enabling radar alerts and adjusting alert radius via a settings sheet.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarEmpty: Displays a centered empty-state view for the radar screen using translated text and an icon.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarFrame: Provides a toggle UI to switch between forecast and past radar frame modes with icons and translations.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarInfoP: Shows computed radar summary details such as start time, duration, intensity, and direction for the current location.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarLayer: Renders a side sheet allowing users to enable or disable various radar overlay layers via switches.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarMap.t: Initializes and manages a Leaflet map, markers, and radar/weather overlay layers based on location and enabled layers.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarOverl: Displays loading, error, or no‑data status messages for non‑precipitation radar overlay layers.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarPlayb: Provides slider and button controls for navigating radar frames, including play/pause and previous/next actions.
frontend/src/components/RadarScreen.tsx: Renders the full radar interface including maps, playback, alerts, and location search, using RainViewer and overlay data.
frontend/src/components/RouteLocationSea: Autocomplete input for selecting route endpoints with loading, error, and clear support.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Supplies a weather-based theme context and applies light or dark mode styling.
frontend/src/components/WeatherPanel.tsx: Shows detailed weather info, advisories, air quality, UV index, and laundry recommendations, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeocodingSearch.ts: Performs debounced geocoding queries and returns matching location results with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useImminentWeatherAle: Evaluates imminent weather alerts, manages dismissal cooldowns, and triggers optional Android bridge notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handles login, logout, and stored identity loading using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarineConditions.t: Fetches marine conditions from Open-Meteo using React Query based on latitude and longitude.
Manages a saved location in localStorage with getters, setters, and clearing capability.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublishWidgetWeath: Publishes weather data to the backend via mutation, exposing publish status and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder noting that feature-specific hooks handle all queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarAlerts.ts: Detects radar-based severe weather alerts and manages alert settings, active alerts, and dismissals.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarOverlayData.t: Fetches weather, air quality, and temperature grid data for radar overlay visualization.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarPlayback.ts: Controls radar frame playback with play, pause, seeking, and frame label helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useRainViewer.ts: Retrieves RainViewer radar data using backend proxy with caching and refresh logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouteWeatherAnalys: Fetches interpolated route weather and analyzes conditions along start-to-end route points.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Syncs a state value with sessionStorage, reading and writing automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeather.ts: Fetches weather and air-quality data, transforms it into a normalized WeatherData shape, and exposes it via a React Query hook.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides locale state, persistence, and translation lookup through a React context.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines Turkish translation strings for UI text and weather-related labels.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Exports a hook that returns the I18n context and enforces usage within the provider.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind-based styles, themes, and weather‑dependent color variants.
frontend/src/lib/clothingAdvisories.ts: Computes clothing recommendations based on temperature, precipitation, wind, and near‑term forecast.
frontend/src/lib/driverAdvisories.ts: Generates driver risk advisories for road ice and fog using current and hourly weather data.
frontend/src/lib/farmerAdvisories.ts: Produces agricultural advisories such as frost, soil moisture, precipitation, planting, and spraying guidance.
frontend/src/lib/fetchWithTimeout.ts: Provides a fetch wrapper that aborts requests after a timeout and throws a custom timeout error.
frontend/src/lib/formatDailyForecastDate: Formats an ISO date into a localized short weekday-month-day string.
frontend/src/lib/imminentWeatherAlerts.t: Analyzes the next hour of weather data to detect imminent rain, snow, storm, or fog alerts.
frontend/src/lib/laundryDrying.ts: Calculates hourly drying scores and classifications based on weather conditions and identifies optimal drying time ranges.
frontend/src/lib/openMeteo.ts: Fetches and normalizes weather data from the Open‑Meteo API into a unified WeatherData structure.
frontend/src/lib/openMeteoMarine.ts: Retrieves marine and supplemental weather data to produce current sea and wind conditions with fallback visibility estimation.
frontend/src/lib/radarNowcastSummary.ts: Computes a simple radar precipitation summary including start time, duration, intensity, and direction.
frontend/src/lib/radarOverlays.ts: Generates visual overlay parameters for storm, snow, wind, temperature, and air‑quality radar layers.
frontend/src/lib/rainviewer.ts: Converts backend RainViewer metadata to frontend format, splits frames by time, and determines initial playback frame.
frontend/src/lib/rainviewerCache.ts: Manages sessionStorage caching for RainViewer data with validation, normalization, expiration, and forecast usability checks.
frontend/src/lib/routeAnalysis.ts: Analyzes weather data along a route to produce risk factors and an overall safety rating.
frontend/src/lib/tirePressure.ts: Generates tire pressure adjustment guidance based on temperature and vehicle type.
frontend/src/lib/weatherContrast.ts: Determines whether a weather theme should use a dark background.
frontend/src/lib/weatherTheme.ts: Maps WMO weather codes to themes, icons, and translation keys for descriptions.
frontend/src/lib/widgetWeatherPayload.ts: Builds backend-ready weather payloads and stable location keys from frontend weather data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/types/androidBridge.d.ts: Declares the Android bridge interface for triggering native notifications.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, plugins, colors, and responsive settings.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related Vite build files.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration with React plugin, path aliases, dev server proxy, and build settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, architecture notes, issues, and pending feature requests for a RainViewer‑based radar/nowcast backend and frontend. Describes caching, proxying, nowcast generation, and UX requirements.
